text: Sir Robert David Muldoon (; 25 September 19215 August 1992) was a New Zealand politician. He was the 31st Prime Minister of New Zealand, from 1975 to 1984, while Leader of the National Party. ==Other websites== * Think Big policy decisions * Archives New Zealand â€“ Robert Muldoon Official Biography Category:1921 births Category:1992 deaths Category:Deputy Prime Ministers of New Zealand Category:Prime Ministers of New Zealand Category:Politicians from Auckland Category:Leaders of the Opposition (New Zealand)
